message: After weeks of planning and gathering your allies, you finally arrive at the castle's gates.

options.message: The general suggests a coordinated attack on multiple fronts.

message: With the strategy set, you now face the challenge of infiltrating the castle walls.

options.message: You lead a small group through a secret passage into the castle with minimal resistance.
You launch a direct assault on the castle walls. The fight is hard, but your determination shines through.

message: The time has come for the final assault on the castle.

options.message: Your forces charge the main gate in a massive attack.

message: The castle falls to your forces. Standing in the throne room, you remember your burning village and the path that led here.

options.message: You work with the general to form a fair government, ensuring no village suffers your fate again.
You claim the throne, promising to rule more justly than your predecessor.
